title: As an ADC main, all I am asking for is the revert of AA cancel
body: Kiting with any champ is awful, especially if you are a main like me that has a high DPI mouse and click on his target to AA it then clicks where you want to go, cause your kite is useless and your attack will get canceled. Also with that update you completely broke Kalista which wasn't in a great spot. Could you revert that or at least change it a little?

replies.body: I have been forced to use the Attack Move command which annoys me because the only key I have available for attack move is MB3 which is loud and clunky. I haven't noticed the changes outside of my mouse skipping around like hell and making me kite worse ugh.

I know. I use a specially tuned mouse too and having to change my keys pisses me off. I am someone that kites manually by AA'ing then giving the command where to move. I skip to kite and I hate having to use Attack Move. Hopefully they will remove this

The AA-lock-in feature was disabled earlier this week because it caused a pre-existing bug to occur more frequently (this is the bug that broke some of Kalista's kiting).  It'll be re-enabled once the bug gets fixed.

Are you still experiencing issues with your auto attacks right now?
Vayne and Jinx mostly. With Vayne especially during last AA for W proc. Sometimes even if it hits target if I move away it cancels.

You can still cancel your own auto attacks, there's just a shorter amount of time where you can't (2 frames), which helps account for  desyncs from what the server thinks you're doing, and what your computer (client) shows that you're doing.  This happens a lot due to lag and high ping!

Have you also investigated Riven? She was able to weave her AA between Q's at way, way higher speeds than any animation-cancelling player could possibly hope to achieve, making her kill pressure way more absurd.
that's the old bug that they disabled it for.
No, they disabled it because of a Kalista bug. Meddler responded to the Riven bug and said it was unintended, but fine, and that Riven wouldn't be disabled because of it.

Frankly man, that could just be you. i've been able to do that with several characters (Vayne, Draven, etc) long before this patch. has to do with When you cancel if manual kiting. don't really know the process brought the whole animation but i know for sure thats been a thing.
O.o I don't understand this concern, I've gotten BETTER at kiting thanks to the changes ._.
As I suggested earlier, it really should be a toggleable option.
I'd like them to keep it in some way, I've had such an easier time CS'ing these days on mages, not randomly cancelling autos is like the best for me right now.
